title: Proposal: Change the voting period to 3 days
summary: This proposal proposes to change the voting period from 5 days to 3 days.
vote_option_context:
Yes: Support proposal to change voting period to 3 days.

No: Oppose proposal to change voting period to 3 days.

Abstain: You do not have a strong opinion and will accept the decision of the majority.

No with veto: You believe that this proposal is harmful and should not be implemented
